hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: cd module5/MusicStoreTest dotnet publish --framework netcoreapp2.0 --output musicstore --configuration release octo pack --id musicstore --version 1.1.%BUILD_NUMBER% --basePath samples/MusicStore/bin/Release/netcoreapp2.0 Octo.exe push --package musicstore.1.1.%BUILD_NUMBER%.nupkg --replace-existing --server http://localhost/ --apiKey API-BNGFXIYQEEBSMRUOSSDWKUAPGY Octo.exe create-release --project musicstore --version 1.1.%BUILD_NUMBER% --packageversion 1.1.%BUILD_NUMBER% --server http://localhost/ --apiKey API-BNGFXIYQEEBSMRUOSSDWKUAPGY --releaseNotes "Jenkins build [%BUILD_NUMBER%]" --packageVersion 1.1.%BUILD_NUMBER% --channel=musicstore
